channel.title: #132: COVID-19 and our businesses
channel.description:
*(Looking for Episode 131? For boring, technical reasons, there is no episode 131.)*
Ed Freyfogle and I discuss how COVID-19 is affecting our lives, our families, and our businesses.
We also talk a little about my acquisition of [Saber Feedback](https://saberfeedback.com/).
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/07d942a4-040c-4c24-97d9-664bcb8f76d3?dark=false"></iframe>
Things we mention in the show:
* [Geomob podcast](https://thegeomob.com/podcast/) * [Audience podcast](https://audience.castos.com/) * [Business of Software conference](https://businessofsoftware.org/)
Thanks to EmailToolTester who sponsored this episode. Find which email newsletter service actually reaches your customers with [EmailToolTester’s deliverability report](https://emailtooltester.com/deliver).
You can also [listen to and download this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/2020/05/01/132-covid-19-and-our-businesses/).
